Title: CanvaIsland - GameFI P2E metaverse based on Ethereum
SiteTitle: CanvaIsland - GameFI P2E metaverse based on Ethereum
IndexTitle: CanvaIsland - GameFI P2E metaverse based on Ethereum
IndexDescription: CanvaIsland -  innovative crypto metaverse and DeFi ecosystem on Ethereum. Explore immersive P2E gameplay, unlock lucrative financial opportunities, and embrace the future of gaming and finance
IndexKeywords: CanvaIsland, crypto metaverse, DeFi ecosystem, Ethereum, blockchain, cryptocurrency, virtual world, decentralized finance
IslandTitle: CanvaIsland NFT Lands: Own Your Exclusive Virtual Land in the Crypto P2E Metaverse
IslandDescription: Own exclusive virtual land in the Crypto P2E metaverse with CanvaIsland. Experience the power of ownership in a thriving meta world. Unlock limitless possibilities today.
IslandKeywords: CanvaIsland, NFT lands, exclusive virtual land, Crypto, P2E, metaverse, ownership, virtual world, digital assets, blockchain
AvatarsTitle: CanvaIsland NFT Avatars: Collect and Stake Your Unique Virtual Identity
AvatarsDescription: Discover CanvaIsland's exclusive NFT avatars, the perfect virtual representation. Own and stake your unique digital identity in the immersive metaverse and unlock endless possibilities.
AvatarsKeywords: CanvaIsland, NFT avatars, virtual identity, staking, metaverse, Sandbox, Decentraland, virtual world, blockchain, digital assets
StakingTitle: Stake and Earn in the DEFI CanvaIsland Metaverse
StakingDescription: Discover staking opportunities in the CanvaIsland metaverse and earn passive income. Stake your tokens and participate in the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem for lucrative rewards.
StakingKeywords: Staking, CanvaIsland, Metaverse, Passive Income, DeFi, Decentralized Finance, Token Staking
SwapDescription: Swap tokens effortlessly in the CanvaIsland metaverse. Experience fast and secure token exchanges, enhanced liquidity, and seamless transactions in the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem.
SwapKeywords: Token Swap, CanvaIsland, Metaverse, DeFi, Decentralized Finance, Token Exchange, Liquidity, Secure Transactions
ReferralTitle: Referral Program: Earn Rewards with CanvaIsland Metaverse
ReferralDescription: Participate in the CanvaIsland metaverse referral program and earn exciting rewards. Invite others to join the thriving decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem and unlock exclusive benefits.
ReferralKeywords: Referral Program, CanvaIsland, Metaverse, Rewards, DeFi, Decentralized Finance, Invite, Benefits
WalletTitle: Canva Crypto Wallet App on Ethereum - The ultimate Web3 Wallet to power your tokens
WalletDescription: Experience the power of Canva Crypto Wallet, the ultimate Web3 wallet app on Ethereum. Safely store and manage your tokens with ease. Unlock the full potential of the decentralized world.
WalletKeywords: Canva Crypto Wallet, Web3 wallet, Ethereum, tokens, crypto wallet app, decentralized, digital assets, blockchain
TokenDescription: Track the latest Canva price, market cap, trading volume, tokenomics, news and more
TokenKeywords: canva, canva token, $canva, canva price, canva market cap, canva trading volume

items.description: d, a portal has opened, similar to the one from which a dinosaur climbed out. Only, apparently, it is from the 2D world and various objects flew out of it, which began to stick to the locals and thereby imprinting them in a frame.

items.title: Development of Metaverse and NFT objects
Testing, debug and optimize the metaverse
Launch the first island with 256 sectors
Creating a stable platform for islands and general camera control functionality
Basic character WASD control, jump, shift and fly
Improving game mechanics & live text chat
Anonymous mode authorization or via MetaMask, Trust Wallet
Adding an inventory which shows purchased lands, avatars, character accessories, and other
For landowners adding the ability to build anything on their plots using voxels
The function of creating different quests and interacting with game characters
Developing an economic model of $CANVA token and creation the smart contracts
Creation of new island with 1024 sectors
Massive community building activities (airdrop, contests, giveaways)
NFT Lands minting (1000 uniqe NFT lands)
Adding a quest line with rewards in $Canva token
Game interface improvement & Adding a mini-map
Injecting your NFTs into built objects
Organize the concert on the Canva Island metaverse
Clan creation feature & Adding the clan chat
Adding the ability to create and purchase equipment: Weapons, armor, jewelry
Clan creation feature & Adding the clan chat
The possibility of extracting resources for land owners
Improving the mechanics of building objects
Trade/retail shop in the Canva Island metaverse
